ABOUT

I'm a third year Graphic Design student at Algonquin College, I will be graduating in 2017. My studies include: Graphic design, Computer Graphics, Advertising and Marketing, Interaction design, Web development, photography, and Typography. Some of my hobbies and interests are Graphic design, Photography, Snowboarding, Web design, UI/UX design, Illustration, Branding, Package design, Poster design, Typography, Fine arts, Cars, and Traveling.
